summary: A test suite that validates the functionality of a multi-database router, checking routing decisions, database selection, handling of deferred models, protection against cross-database foreign key, generic, many-to-many, and one-to-one relationships, manager behavior, migration selection, partial routing configurations, and subquery execution.
business_intent: To guarantee that the application's database routing layer correctly directs ORM operations, prevents illegal cross-database relationships, and supports migrations and queries across multiple databases, thereby preserving data integrity and reliable multi-database operation.
